    • Constructor Detail

      • Directory

        public Directory(java.lang.String name,
                 Directory parent)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This constructor call the constructor of File with FileType Directory and calculated size
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Directory with specified constraints
        parent - the parent Directory in which the Directory is created. null if this is a root directory
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when 1) directory name does not conform. 2) there's already a file with name name in the parent directory
        See Also:
        File

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String name)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Delete the file with name name from this directory The file can be a Directory or a Document
        Parameters:
        name - name of the file to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when 1)name is "." or ".." 2)file with name name does not exist in this directory

      • findDir

        public Directory findDir(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Find the directory whose name is name
        Parameters:
        name - name of the directory to find
        Returns:
        Directory with name name
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when 1)File "name" is not a directory 2)No file with name name exists in this directory
